title: AP champs getting the shaft once again
body:
You know what's funny? The fact that tanks only buy ONE magic resist item and can effectively ignore all AP damage. Riot decided it was a good idea to give them even more resistances, so now you have an item with a refreshable 15% magic damage reduction.

Nvm the fact that there's only one barely viable AP jungler {{champion:60}}. Nvm the fact that full AD teams are now actually viable due to AD melting tanks no matter what {{item:3153}} {{item:1419}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3036}} {{item:3033}} {{item:3147}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3814}}.

{{item:3156}} already puts the user outside of kill range of any mage, the same does {{item:3071}} with its 400 HP.

Late game AP champs already deal nearly no damage to tanks, and most of the time unless you're {{champion:103}} you will lose basically every fight as a burst mage. Let's not forget the massive AP nerfs to {{item:3157}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3001}}. AP itemization is literally the most one-sided in the entire game.

Literally every time I pick a tank, I laugh at AP champs - I can stand still in a spot and tank a mage with {{item:3135}} for 15 seconds and not die with one MR item. Yet, with 4 armor items, {{champion:236}} will kill me in a couple of autos with his {{item:3153}} {{item:3071}}.

**SOMEHOW** Riot figured out that AP champions were the problem and gave them yet another set of unjustified nerfs.
